sentences.sContent: Satan uses this secret aspect of the occult to weave his deception.
sentences.sContent_eng: Satan uses this secret aspect of the occult to weave his deception.
sentences.sCn: 撒旦用这个秘密装出神秘的样子来编织它的骗术。

sentences.sContent: If it convicts, then it is from God, but if it condemns then it is from Satan.
sentences.sContent_eng: If it convicts, then it is from God, but if it condemns then it is from Satan.
sentences.sCn: 如果这是定罪，那么它就是来自于上帝；如果是谴责，这就是来自撒旦。

sentences.sContent: Satan attempts to imitate this in the occult by making us feel special, as we are part of a secretive, hidden realm.
sentences.sContent_eng: Satan attempts to imitate this in the occult by making us feel special, as we are part of a secretive, hidden realm.
sentences.sCn: 撒旦企图仿效这个秘密让我们感觉到特别，如同我们是秘密的一部分，隐藏在他的领域里。

trans.tranOther: the Devil, considered to be the main evil power and God’s opponent
